        public static java.lang.String matchLength(java.lang.Object object,
                           java.lang.String symbol,
                           int length)
        Return a new string that match the provided length. String with shorter length will be added space at behind. String with longer length will be truncated to the specified length.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String[] columnHeads,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> table,
                        java.lang.String cellSeparator,
                        int cellwidth)
        Return a table from the provided column heads and table.
        Parameters:
        columnHeads - column names or the first row of the table
        table - a 2-dimensional array that holds the data
        cellSeparator - separator between columns, recommended "|"
        cellwidth - the maximum width (number of character) of each cell
        Returns:
